main event: Two soldiers at Misawa Air Base observed several flashes of light in the sky on 8 May 1952.
interesting points: The flashes included two blue flashes and one red flash,The blue flashes faded after bursting and had a spray effect,There was a 20-minute interval between the first and second blue flashes,The third flash lasted about 1 minute and was seen approximately 1 mile north at an estimated altitude of 35,000-40,000 feet,The observation duration for each flash was about 2 minutes.
sighted object: flashes of blue and red light in the sky
